author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Gets the report of a task created for a submitted file or URL.
commands.name: anyrun-get-report

commands.description: Submit a file or url for analysis.
commands.name: anyrun-run-analysis

integration.description: ANY.RUN is a cloud-based sanbox with interactive access.
integration.name: ANY.RUN

playbook.description:
Detonates one or more URLs using the ANYRUN sandbox integration.
Returns relevant reports to the War Room and url reputations to the context data.
playbook.name: Detonate URL - ANYRUN

playbook.description:
Detonates one or more remote files using the ANYRUN sandbox integration.
Returns relevant reports to the War Room and file reputations to the context data.
This type of analysis works only for direct download links.
playbook.name: Detonate File From URL - ANYRUN

playbook.description:
Detonates one or more files using the ANYRUN sandbox integration.
Returns relevant reports to the War Room and file reputations to the context data.
All file types are supported.
playbook.name: Detonate File - ANYRUN

description: ANY.RUN is a cloud-based sandbox with interactive access.
name: ANY.RUN
